title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather requirements from stakeholders, define the project scope, and create a detailed project plan.

title: Design AR Learning Platform Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture for the Augmented Reality Education project. This includes the AR rendering engine, content management system, user interface, and data storage. Consider scalability, performance, security, and maintainability. Define the high-level components, their responsibilities, and interactions. Also, outline the integration with existing educational platforms, if applicable.

title: Develop AR Rendering Engine
description: Implement the AR rendering engine responsible for displaying interactive 3D content and overlaying it on the real-world environment.

title: Build Content Management System
description: Develop a system for creating, managing, and distributing AR learning content, including 3D models, animations, and interactive simulations.

title: Design User Interface and Experience
description: Create an intuitive, engaging, visually appealing, accessible, and easy-to-navigate user interface for students and educators. The UI should be optimized for different device types (smartphones, tablets, AR headsets) and incorporate gamification elements to enhance the learning experience. Ensure accessibility features are implemented to cater to users with disabilities. To achieve this, consider collaboration between UX/UI designers, frontend developers, and accessibility experts.

title: Implement Security and Privacy Measures
description: Ensure the platform adheres to security and privacy best practices, including data encryption, user authentication, and access control.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated testing, building, and deploying the AR learning platform.

title: Conduct User Acceptance Testing
description: Plan and execute user acceptance testing with educators and students to validate the platform's functionality and usability.

title: Write Documentation and User Guides
description: Create comprehensive documentation and user guides for educators, students, and administrators.

title: Deploy and Launch AR Learning Platform
description: Deploy the AR learning platform to production environments and coordinate the official launch.
dependencies: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
